page.title: 15TOURISM KINNERTON,EVENJOBB
page.content: AN EXCELLANT AREA FOR THOSE WHO ENJOY BEAUTIFUL,QUIET COUNTRYSIDE,WITH WOODS MIXED FARMLAND,HILLS & SEVERAL SMALL LAKES.FOR WALKERS THERE IS THE OFFA'S DYKE LONG DISTANCE FOOTPATH & AT LEAST 2 OTHER PATHS PLUS LANES.THERE ARE 4 SELF CATERING HOLIDAY HOMES INCLUDING A RESTORED LATE MEDIEVAL CRUCK BUILT FARM HOUSE.THERE IS 1 HOUSE OFFERING BED & BREAKFAST.FOR THOSE INTERESTED IN ANCIENT & EARLY HISTORY THERE ARE STANDING STONES,VARIOUS MOTTES AND A SIZEABLE CAMP OR CASTLE RING.VISITORS COME TO THE AREA FROM MANY PARTS OF THE WORLD TO ENJOY SUCH PURSUITS AS BIRD WATCHING,FISHING,& DELVING INTO HISTORY.MANY PLACES OF GREAT INTEREST ARE WITHIN EASY MOTORING DISTANCE.
